summary: This is a brief email exchange from July 24, 2019, where one person forwards information about Epstein to another, questioning why a third party's job as 'boss' is relevant and raising concerns about confidentiality. The email references a document identifier (SDNY_00011743).

events.title: Email exchange about Epstein information
events.description: An email was sent discussing information about Epstein, questioning the relevance of a third party's job as 'boss' and raising confidentiality concerns.

keyFacts: An email exchange on July 24, 2019, discusses forwarding information about Jeffrey Epstein.
The sender questions why a third party's role as 'boss' is relevant to the Epstein matter.
The sender expresses concern that the information should be confidential, referencing 'SDNY_00011743'.
The document is part of the Epstein case files, indicating internal discussions about case information handling.
